item.title: Street light not working, 4th December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lane, Eltham

item.title: Abandoned UNTAXED vehicle, 4th December
item.description:
I have now reported this abandoned van 3 times. It has been parked here since May and not moved so has quite obviously been dumped. It is taking up valuable parking spaces. You have not done anything about this but this vehicle is now untaxed so you need to take action.it is in a state of disrepair and been stationary for 7 months! You have a responsibility to remove untaxed and abandoned vehicles from the boroughs roads. I hope this now gets some action
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 191, Blackfen Road, Blackfen, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the grass by the stream., 4th December
item.description:
Someone literally walked past me carrying a large washing machine and threw it in the stream!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Streamway, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked in Bostall Garden, 4th December
item.description:
This car have been parked in Bostall Gardens, next to the fitness area for at least a week. I see it in the morning while walking my dog, I don't see people in or around it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rochdale Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: By the big tree outside 33 Kenilworth road, 4th December
item.description:
Big cardboard box of TV and another box dumped by the big tree outside 33 Kenilworth Road. This is a well known dumping ground and it so happens that the boxes have the dumper’s address still stuck to it! It has come from 33A Kenilworth Road. They have used this tree to dump their stuff before but now you can see this for yourself, clear as day. Please take action. This type of fly tipping is unacceptable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kenilworth Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag
